definitions.text: a following of one thing after another in time
examples: the doctor saw a sequence of patients

definitions.text: a group of people or things arranged or following in order
examples: a succession of stalls offering soft drinks

definitions.text: the action of following in order
examples: he played the trumps in sequence

definitions.text: (ecology) the gradual and orderly process of change in an ecosystem brought about by the progressive replacement of one community by another until a stable climax is established
acquisition of property by descent or by will
